thread.title: NH authorities identify man shot and killed in Bath
thread.title_full: NH authorities identify man shot and killed in Bath - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: NH authorities identify man shot and killed in Bath
text:
BATH, N.H. - New Hampshire authorities identified the man shot and killed by police in Bath.
Police say yesterday they found a crashed vehicle on an abandoned bridge. It belonged to 42-year-old Hagan Etsy-Lennon of Canterbury. New Hampshire Attorney General's office says two Haverhill cops wearing body cameras found Etsy-Lennon he was carrying a knife and had a stab wound in the chest.
Investigators say he lunged at them still holding the blade. They shot Etsy-Lennon six times.
The investigation continues.
Related Story:
Report: NH State police investigate officer-involved shooting
